name: Shipment Data Analyst
description:
ControlPay is a Global freight audit solution provider. We are trusted Partner between our customers and their carriers. Every year we process millions of transport orders and invoices. Doing this by our own developed programs and supported by customers' service teams we achieve cost saving and visibility in the complex processes of our clients. This makes ControlPay the innovative and fast-growing company, leading the social responsible business on the market.

We are looking for Shipment Data Analyst to join our team.

YOU will be involved in:

  • Navigation through and usage of ControlPay web-platform and support tools;
  • Shipment data analysis;
  • Calculation logics check;
  • Freight invoices verification via ControlPay web-platform;
  • Communication with our customers (via ControlPay internal system).

Person we are looking for:

YOU need to:

  • Know English on the Intermediate level (or above);
  • Have good skills of MS Office;
  • Have strong analytical skills;
  • Have logistics knowledge (as a plus).

YOU are:

  • Attentive to details;
  • Assiduous;
  • Responsible;
  • Flexible;
  • Proactive in problem solving;
  • Fast-learner;
  • Team player;
  • Able to prioritize, and multi-task;

What we offer to You:

  • Experience of cooperation in a cross-cultural environment with dedicated professionals;
  • Friendly and energetic team as well as significant support from colleagues;
  • Long-term employment;
  • Competitive compensation level;
  • Special Adaptation Training program;
  • Health care (medical insurance, office massage, yoga);
  • Sport Communities;
  • Team-building activities;
  • Comfortable working place with modern facilities;
  • Office close to Vasylkivska subway station;
  • Free transfer from subway station - to the office;
  • Possibility to combine the remote work with the office one.

Development opportunities include:

  • Periodical performance and progress review;
  • Transparent path of career and professional growth;
  • Internal training programs.

If you are interested in this position and match above-stated requirements, please do not hesitate to send your CV.
